prompts: Create a large quadruped Pokémon that resembles a fluffy dog with a majestic mane.
I want a Pokémon that embodies the spirit of loyalty and friendship, with a noble appearance.
Generate a Pokémon that thrives in grassy areas and has a strong protective instinct.
Make a unique Normal-type Pokémon with a blend of earthy colors and a sturdy build.
Imagine a Pokémon with a gentle demeanor that safeguards its territory with fierce determination.
Design a Pokémon that showcases a combination of strength and agility, perfect for wild terrains.
Show me a Pokémon that has a bushy tail and a warm, inviting expression.
